nodes.text: Star Wars: Yoda's Riddle Book is an activity book published by Egmont Books that was released on July 28, 2016.

Follow the teachings of Master Yoda through 150 riddles and puzzles and develop the wisdom and knowledge of the greatest Jedi masters! Use your powers of observation and deduction to discover the secrets of the Force ...without going to the dark side. Solve them, you must!
